rukus.text: D̂wy phranām k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ p̄hū̂thrng kruṇā prānī p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
kār s̄rrs̄eriỵ thậngh̄lāy nận pĕn s̄ithṭhi k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ p̄hū̂ pĕn phracêā h̄æ̀ng s̄ākl lok
p̄hū̂thrng kruṇā prānī p̄hū̂thrng mettā s̄emx
c̄hephāa phraxngkh̒ thèānận thī̀ phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ kheā rph xi bā daḥˌ læa c̄hephāa phraxngkh̒ thèānận thī̀ phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ k̄hx khwām ch̀wyh̄elụ̄x
k̄hx phraxngkh̒ thrng næanả phwk k̄ĥā phraxngkh̒ sụ̀ng thāng xạn theī̀yngtrng
(khụ̄x) thāng k̄hxng brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ phraxngkh̒ dị̂ thrng pordprān kæ̀ phwk k̄heā michı̀ thāng k̄hxng phwk thī̀ t̄hūk krîw læa michı̀ thāng k̄hxng phwk thī̀ h̄lng p̄hid
